description: Ahhh, those ubiquitous toxins... Fortified by fear-mongering from sites like EWG, made safe, natural news. They are an unreliable and poor “resource” because they only rate ingredients based on hazards (even with large data gaps). Thus, there is no consideration of dose, exposure, and therefore risk. The more they scare the more sales they make & donations pour in. #scienceisbeautiful
